articles.title: Verstappen beats Leclerc and Russell to pole for season-opening Bahrain Grand Prix - Formula 1
articles.description: Red Bull’s Max Verstappen grabbed pole position for the Bahrain Grand Prix in a tight first qualifying session of the 2024 season, edging out Ferrari rival Charles Leclerc and Mercedes’ George Russell for top spot.
